Pendent of the Emperor's Judgement-test.description: Once per battle, a unit within 6" can re-roll all failed hit rolls.

Blade of the Relic Bearer.description: Melee weapon gains +1 Strength and +1 Damage.

Burning Blade.description: Melee weapon gains S+2, AP-4, D3 damage.

Relic of the Lost Cadia.description: Units within 6" automatically pass morale tests.
